pcre-ocaml 6.2.5


    

      

        

          
    
            
             
  • 
               version 6.2.5
             
    • 
            
  • 7.0.2
    •   
  • 7.0.3

              Maintainer
              markus.mottl@gmail.com
            

      
            
            
            

              Dependencies
              

        

      

        

          &
          
       conf-libpcre
    
        

        

       ocamlfind
    

      

    

      

            

      
            
            
            
            
            

              Published
              Aug 21, 2012
            

      
            
        

        Source  [http] 
        
          https://github.com/mmottl/pcre-ocaml/archive/v6.2.5.tar.gz

           6b15ccd734db50a9abb9ebaa7c14e1f4 
        		
        

      
             
            
            

              Edit
              
        https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/tree/master/packages/pcre-ocaml/pcre-ocaml.6.2.5/opam
      
            

      
          
        


        

    
Interface to the PCRE (Perl-compatibility regular expressions) library

    
This OCaml-library interfaces the C-library PCRE (Perl-compatibility
Regular Expressions). It can be used for matching regular expressions
which are written in "PERL"-style.
